This is a list of currently supported Digitalus tags in templates
=Introduction=
From version 1.8 on the Digitalus CMS features an improved templating concept.
A detailed description of how to get started with this templating system can be downloaded from the [http://digitalus-cms.googlecode.com/files/Designing%20Templates%20for%20Digitalus%20CMS.pdf Google code site].
Here You can find a list with currently supported Digitalus tags and their attributes.
=Digitalus Tags=
==Digitalus Control==
===Description===
A DigitalusControl provides a form element in the admin area. The controls can be divided into three different types of inputs. The control's type attribute is *case sensitive*!!
  # simple text input fields (_text_, _textarea_)
  # javascript supported input fields (_fckeditor_, _markitup_, _tinymce_, _wymeditor_, _wysiwyg_)
  # dropdown list to select a module (_moduleSelector_)
For all types the attribute _group_ is available. It is used to group the controls in content sections. For each group a list item is created at page->edit: page options->content sections.
The _id_ is also used as the label for the form element in the admin area.
===Example===
`<digitalusControl type='fckeditor' id='content' required='true' cols='60' rows='4' group='main' />`
===Attributes===
||attribute||supported values||description||supported attributes||
||type||text||simple text type input field `<input type="text" />`||_group_, _`<input type="text" />` allowed tags_||
|| ||textarea||textarea `<textarea></textarea>`||_group_, _`<textarea>` allowed tags_||
|| ||fckeditor||fckeditor javascript input field||_group_, _`<textarea>` allowed tags_||
|| ||markitup||markitup javascript input field||_group_, _`<textarea>` allowed tags_||
|| ||tinymce||tinymce javascript input field||_group_, _`<textarea>` allowed tags_||
|| ||wymeditor||wymeditor javascript input field||_group_, _`<textarea>` allowed tags_||
|| ||wysiwyg||jquery wysiwyg javascript input field||_group_, _`<textarea>` allowed tags_||
|| ||moduleSelector||module selection dropdown list||_group_, _`<select>` allowed tags_||
==Digitalus Navigation==
===Description===
===Example===
`<digitalusNavigation type='menu' parentId='0' levels='1' currentLevel='1' id='menu' />`

`<digitalusNavigation type='submenu' id='submenu' levels='2' />`

`<digitalusNavigation type='breadcrumbs' id='breadcrumb' />`
===Attributes===
||type attribute||supported values||description||supported attributes||
||type||menu||creates a menu using the view helper _Digitalus_View_Helper_Navigation_RenderMenu_||*parentId*, *levels*, *currentLevel*, *id*||
|| ||submenu||creates a submenu using the view helper _Digitalus_View_Helper_Navigation_RenderSubmenu_||*levels*, *id*||
|| ||breadcrumbs||creates a submenu using the view helper _Digitalus_View_Helper_Navigation_RenderBreadcrumbs_||*separator*, *siteRoot*||
